summary:
A lot of Mods from skyrim.nexusmods.com put together. Nearly 2GB!
This is how I use to play.
Most of them are visual, improved textures (HD), meshes, but also some other things...
Just merge the included \"data\"-directory with the one found in the skyrim-directory.
